
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int maxim(int a,int b)
{
    if(a>b)
        return a;
    else
        return b;
}
int dp[1002][1002];
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    int d=1;
    while(T-->0)
    {
        int p,q;
        cin>>p>>q;
        string a,b;
        cin>>a;
        cin>>b;
        int i,j;
        for(i=0;i<=p;i++)
        {
            for(j=0;j<=q;j++)
            {
                if(i==0 || j==0)
                    dp[i][j]=0;
                else if(a[i-1]==b[j-1])
                    dp[i][j]=1+dp[i-1][j-1];
                else
                    dp[i][j]=maxim(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);
            }

        }
        int res=p+q-dp[p][q];
        cout<<"Case "<<d<<": "<<res<<endl;
        d++;
    }
}
